ComicInfo.Title: Any Number Can Slay!
ComicInfo.Summary: Any Number Can Slay!: There's a new Big Man in town, and he's recruited the Enforcers to help him take down Spider-Man and the Human Torch.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:49:30. [Issue ID 29233]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
